pattern_1.name: Digital Circuit Botanica
pattern_1.color_strategy: Electric cyan primary creates maximum impact against deep black backgrounds. Hot pink secondary adds energy while lime green reinforces the botanical connection. Metallic silver provides tech sophistication.

pattern_2.name: Holographic Fern Matrix
pattern_2.color_strategy: Medium violet primary creates mystical depth. Turquoise secondary adds holographic shimmer effect. Light pink provides organic softness while maintaining futuristic appeal.

pattern_3.name: Bioluminescent Moss Network
pattern_3.color_strategy: Lime green primary mimics bioluminescence. Cyan creates network connection feel. Forest green provides natural grounding while slate gray adds tech sophistication.

pattern_4.name: Cyber Bloom Transformation
pattern_4.color_strategy: Dark cyan primary represents transformation midpoint. Hot pink adds energy and femininity. Steel blue provides stability while beige offers organic warmth.

pattern_5.name: Quantum Leaf Circuitry
pattern_5.color_strategy: Royal blue primary creates quantum depth. Amber secondary adds warmth and energy highlights. Light cyan provides ethereal translucency while midnight blue grounds the design.

printing_considerations.cmyk_conversion_notes: Neon colors require spot color printing for maximum vibrancy
printing_considerations.substrate_compatibility: Optimized for synthetic fiber dyes and digital textile printing
printing_considerations.color_fastness: Target minimum 4/5 rating for wash and light fastness

special_effects_integration.uv_reactive: UV-reactive pigments recommended for accent colors
special_effects_integration.moisture_responsive: Thermochromic elements can be integrated with temperature-sensitive dyes

eco_friendly_alternatives.low_impact_processing: Digital printing reduces water usage by 95%
eco_friendly_alternatives.recycled_substrates: Compatible with recycled polyester and organic cotton blends

sustainability_notes.lifecycle_considerations: Colors selected for maximum longevity and reduced environmental impact
